question: Who among the following ruler of Utpal dynasty founded a new city Avantipur?
explanation: The ruler of Utpal dynasty, Avantivarman ruled Kashmir during 855 AD to 883 AD. He founded a new city AvantipurÂ  (Bantipur) and built a town Suryapura. His court was adorned by two famous poets, Ratnakar and Anandavardhana.
